text: Brian David Schweitzer (born September 4, 1955) is an American politician. He served as the 23rd Governor of Montana from January 5, 2005 to January 7, 2013. Schweitzer formerly served as chair of the Western Governors Association as well as the Democratic Governors Association.http://www.democraticgovernors.org/news/press_releases?id=0295DGA begins 2010 election with a bang He also served as president of the Council of State Governments. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Montana Category:People from Havre, Montana Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Brian Schweitzer
